```{r, load-data}

```

## Review Data

My data has `r nrow(my_data)` rows and `r ncol(my_data)` columns.

## Data Visualization

```{r, make-table}
table(my_data$Year)
```
```{r, make-scatter}
plot(my_data$Year, my_data$Illnesses)
```
